title: Introducing: Magnus Bechmann
body:
Big into this slightly cheesy but gloriously upbeat pop from Norway’s [Magnus Bechmann](https://soundcloud.

com/magnusbechmann), merging elements of Talking Heads with more contemporary influences like Two Door Cinema Club or Hot Chip – it’s deliriously addictive. Check out _Second Chance_ below.

excerpt.full: Big into this slightly cheesy but gloriously upbeat pop from Norway’s Magnus Bechmann, merging elements of Talking Heads with more contemporary influences like Two Door Cinema Club or Hot Chip – it’s deliriously addictive. Check out Second Chance below.
